title: Junior Business Analyst
description:
Our client is seeking a consultant with 3-6 years of experience to work as a risk projects junior business analyst. The role involves bridging the gap between technical teams and business stakeholders while ensuring compliance with regulatory standards.


Support business analysis, process optimization, and regulatory compliance initiatives within the bank
Work closely with senior analysts and project managers to assess risks, improve processes, and contribute to system enhancements
Responsibilities include leading requirements gathering, stakeholder management, and ensuring alignment with banking regulations
Documenting business requirements, assisting in data analysis, and coordinating with stakeholders to ensure compliance with regulatory/banks policies
Cross functional team collaboration with risk, finance, and technology teams to develop business solutions
Experience in risk management in banking or financial services and in risk management frameworks (e.g., Basel, CCAR, IFRS 9)
Experience in derivatives – Fixed Income, Risk systems like Murex – preferred
Strong problem-solving and communication skills are essential
Data Analysis skills and MS Excel, SQL is required.
Exceptionally effective communication skills, adaptive learner, and collaborator
Cross functions experience in handling issues with Risk, IT and other business lines involved in the process.
Undergraduate degree and Postgraduate in MBA or Finance, FRM preferred
